title: Cyber Metal Bundle
description: 77 cyber metal songs, awaiting your instructions.
longDescription:
All the best-selling and beloved Cyber Metal songs have come together.


Dear game developers and filmmakers, Cyber ​​Metal Bundle has been updated, check out the added songs:


1. Inside The Gun

2. Personal Club Systems

3. Artillery Fire

4. Make It BOOM

5. Machine Eater

6. Perish

7. Replica

8. Sapiens

9. Savant


This package, consisting of 77 UNIQUE SONGS, is a compilation of many of our other packages and is offered with a discount. You can find the mentioned packages below:


Cyber Metal Music: Hardcore, Limitless, Relentless

Cyber Metal Music 2: Insane, Restless, Reckless

Cyber Metal Music: Chronos

Cyber Metal Music: Your Stolen Rage

Cyber Metal Music: Full Menace 2.0


By visiting the link HERE you can access the 1-hour preview video containing some songs.


FEATURES


  • Commercial-level full-length compositions.
  • 77 unique cyber metal music in total.
  • BPM info provided for many songs.
  • Use songs on YouTube or any other platform, as well as games.
  • Songs are only full versions and cannot be looped from start to finish.


MORE INFO


  • Unique Music: 77 full-length cyber metal music
  • Audio Cues: 77
  • Total Length: 5+ hours
  • Size: 4.93 GB (uncompressed)
  • Looping: No, Commercial Full-Length
  • BPM Info: Yes (for some songs)
  • File Type: 24-bit, WAV
  • Sample Rate: 44100
  • Mastered: Yes
  • Loudness Method: Industry Standard (Loud but varied)
technicalDetails:
You can email us with new ideas and opinions, technical questions, corrections or inquiries, or even just to chat. Your feedback enhances the value of every product you purchase, and we consider it important.


FAQ


  • Can I use your products in my commercial projects without any restrictions?
  • Yes, absolutely! You can use them in all kinds of content, including films, games, or YouTube videos, even for commercial purposes.


  • Will there be a problem if I upload a video to YouTube that contains music from Intersonic Sound?
  • No, there won't be any problem. Our products are structured not to claim "Content ID" rights, and your channel will not receive a copystrike warning.


  • Do you update your products?
  • There are products that we have updated and will continue to update. We may not update all of them, but the likelihood of us adding new content to your purchased product as a free update is very high.


  • What file format do you use?
  • We prefer 24-bit WAV files. If the package size becomes too large, we might consider 16-bit WAV, but we have not done this yet. For now, we have processed every product as a 24-bit WAV.
